content.value: We cover two main topics in this section:
content.resolvedHtml:
We cover two main topics in this section: 

Developing in a team

Set your team up for success by figuring out how your team will manage changes and work together before diving in.

Implementing best practices

Save time and effort by encouraging your developers to remember some key concepts such as performance and security.

overview.value: Build out your project by setting up an environment your team can collaborate in and sticking to best practices.

teaser.value: When you have the project requirements and a solid architecture plan in place, you can start development. This section helps you get your development started smoothly by helping you avoid future problems and costly re-work by getting your development team on the same page.
